message.body: Hey, Lindsey! I have an interview today for an Interactive Project Manager position. If they ask, is it ok for me to list you as a reference? Our experience working together on aka would nicely round out my academic references.
Thanks! It might not turn into anything more than an interview but I want to be prepared.
Well I hope it works out. I know your job has been tough lately. Let me know if you need anything else!
